contentList.content: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked. You can set a password that, when spoken within 5 feet of the object, suppresses this spell for 1 minute. Otherwise, it is impassable until it is broken or the spell is dispelled or suppressed, and must be broken or picked.
You speak a password, opening an object that you have locked using Arcane Lock for 1 minute.
This object has been magically locked.
This object is under the effects of Arcane Lock, but has been given a password suppressing its effects temporarily.
